name: Katakana Memory Hint [English]
description: 1. Description  Study katakana the fun way using mnemonic pictures  and check your understanding with a variety of quizzes!  Recommended for: Complete beginners in Japanese Anyone interested in Japanese letters  2. Features  -Features pictures, sound and animation to help you remember the katakana characters. -Includes quizzes for checking your understanding of the katakana youve learned. -Includes simple explanations about the Japanese writing system and the characters used in it. -A katakana table allows you to tap each katakana to hear how its pronounced.  3. Tested Devices  AndroidSamsung Galaxy S5 ,Samsung Galaxy S4 ,Sony Xperia Z Ultra ,HTC J ONE ,Lenovo A916 , Asus ZenPhone 2 , Huawei Ascend G620S , LG Nexus5 , Asus Nexus7 2012 , Sony Xepria Z3 SOL26  4.Contact the Developer  If you have any questions or suggestions please feel free to send  them to us at the following email address. app-kc@jpf.go.jp
